original_table_html:
OBJECTIVE 13-1 Explain the role of retailers in the distribution channel and describe the major types of retailers.
Retailing (pp 392–399)
OBJECTIVE 13-2 Describe the major retailer marketing decisions.
Retailer Marketing Decisions (pp 400–405)
OBJECTIVE 13-3 Discuss the major trends and developments in retailing.
Retailing Trends and Developments (pp 405–411)
OBJECTIVE 13-4 Explain the major types of wholesalers and their marketing decisions.
Wholesaling (pp 411–416)
summary_markdown: This chapter outline details key learning objectives related to distribution channels and marketing. It begins with Objective 13-1, focusing on the fundamental role of retailers within the distribution channel and categorizing major retailer types, referencing pages 392-399. Objective 13-2 then delves into the significant marketing decisions retailers make, with relevant content on pages 400-405. Following this, Objective 13-3 addresses broader industry shifts by discussing major trends and developments in the field of retailing, covered on pages 405-411. Finally, Objective 13-4 shifts focus to the other end of the distribution channel, explaining the primary classifications of wholesalers and their associated marketing decisions, as detailed on pages 411-416. The structure progresses from defining retail's role and decisions to examining industry trends, and then to understanding wholesaling.
